title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 May 22 TH [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Thursday, 22 May 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Thursday, May 22 edition of The Alex Jones Show, Alex covers the ongoing militarization of the American government and new developments in the pseudo-science known as "climate change," a fraud supported by corrupt politicians but not real-world data. 

While U.S. special forces and foreign troops practice invading Tampa, the Pentagon refuses to tell the Senate which groups they are waging war against. 

The TSA is also looking to purchase 24 million rounds of "duty" ammunition, an amount far more than what would be expected if the ammo was only intended for the agency's 4,000 Federal Air Marshals. 

On today's show, former British official and climate change skeptic Lord Christopher Monckton exposes the latest lies from the "global warming" crowd.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
